customFields.Priority P1 to P4: P2 - Core Functions (Do core functions work?)

inline.description:
Drag and Drop DMs
————————————————————————————
  1. Hover over DMs on the sidebar
inline.expectedResult:
• Small drag handle displays on the left of the channel type icon
  • Mouse cursor changes to Hand Pointer Finger

• Mouse cursor becomes dragging cursor - closed hand
  • DM being dragged should float beneath the mouse cursor
  • Channels category dims
• The whole DM category is outlined to indicate that the entire DM category is a dropzone

inline.description: 1. Drag a DM over Channels category header while category is expanded
inline.expectedResult: • Channels category remains dimmed and does not give indication DM can be dropped there

inline.description: 1. Drag a DM over Channels category header while category is collapsed
inline.expectedResult: • Channels category remains dimmed and does not expand or give indication DM can be dropped there

inline.description: 1. Drag a DM over any custom Category header (or Favorited) while that category is collapsed
inline.expectedResult:
• Category header is outlined indicating items can be dropped there
  • Shows an indication that channel will drop in the first position

customFields.Important notes about this step: When a channel (that is not currently open in the main view) is moved to a category that is collapsed the category shows an indication that channel will drop in the first position even though it will not be visible/shown there immediately - Expected?

inline.description: 1. Drag a DM over any custom Category header (or Favorites) while that category is expanded
inline.expectedResult:
• Category header is outlined indicating items can be dropped there
  • Shows an indication that channel will drop in the first position
  • DMs can be dropped between exising channels

• Item can be dragged in any direction, vertically or horizontally
  • Can't drop cursor is shown when hovering outside of sidebar or non-droppable areas on the sidebar

inline.description: 1. Drag a DM to near top or bottom of the sidebar to trigger scrolling
inline.expectedResult:
• Scrolling while dragging is allowed
  • Scrolling should be smooth, not sticky or jumpy

• Dragging is canceled
  • DM is returned to its original position

inline.description: 1. Collapse a category and drop a read DM into a category header directly
inline.expectedResult:
• Shows an indication DM will placed at the top of the category
  • Category remains collapsed after the drop

customFields.Related ticket(s): Favorites category header fails to outline when dropping DMs if positioned below DM category on the LHS — MM-26399

inline.description: 1. Expand a category and drop a read DM into category header directly
inline.expectedResult:
• Shows an indication DM will placed at the top of the category
  • Category remains expanded after the drop
  • DMs can be dropped between exising channels/DMs/GMs

customFields.Related ticket(s): (Queued) Favorites category header fails to outline when dropping DMs if positioned below DM category on the LHS — MM-26399

inline.description: 1. Collapse a category and drop an unread DM into a category header directly
inline.expectedResult:
• Shows an indication DM will placed at the top of the category
  • Category remains collapsed after the drop
  • Unread channel that was just dropped is shown on the list

inline.description: 1. Expand a category and drop an unread DM into category header directly
inline.expectedResult:
• Shows an indication DM will placed at the top of the category
  • Category remains expanded after the drop and newly dropped channel is placed at the top of the channel list
